testimonial_heading: Join the thousands of investors already using Sharesight to manage their investment portfolios
testimonial_heading_xero: What people are saying about Sharesight + Xero

columns.title: Track your dividends
columns.description: Import your trading history, then sit back and watch as corporate actions such as dividends, and stock splits are automatically incorporated.

columns.title: Know your true performance
columns.description: Understand exactly how your investments are performing with daily price & currency updates, plus powerful reports and optional email alerts.

columns.title: Save time and money
columns.description: Share access to your portfolio and tax reports with your accountant in a few clicks and you’ll be on your way to saving time and money during tax time.
